body.p: In Killerfiller you are supposed to inflect certain words from certain parts of speech in sentential contexts. You may choose the level yourself, and work with possessive suffixes, for example.
Parts of our resources are beta versions. This means that there may be errors in them. Feel free to send us corrections and suggestions for improvement! (oahpa@uit.no)
Do you need help with the grammar? Go to this site: Grammar
Here the program generates paradigms for any lexeme: Inflectional paradigms
